content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I asked the AI to search for hiking trails near me using the "google" command. The AI returned a list of websites with hiking trails near different cities.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.alltrails.com/", "question": "What are the best hiking trails near me?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: an advertisement for the AllTrails app, which provides information on hiking trails in various locations, including Brno and other regions in the Czech Republic. The app offers a variety of features, including verified trails, offline maps, and community reviews. It also promotes environmental conservation through partnerships with organizations like Leave No Trace and One Tree Planted.\n\nLinks: ['AllTrails (https://www.alltrails.com/?ref=header)', 'Explore (https://www.alltrails.com/explore?ref=header)', 'Community (https://www.alltrails.com/community?ref=header)', 'Saved (https://www.alltrails.com/members/slug/favorites?ref=header)', 'Shop (https://www.alltrails.com/)']", type='action_result')]
"""
